name: Light of Arad: Forerunner
author: Jegal Bokja
content: Summoned to purify the corruption spreading across Arad...?Jinseong, a player who dedicated his life to &quotDungeon &amp Fighter,&quot is summoned to Arad by the transcendent Nemer and given the mission of becoming the Claw Master.“You shall become the Claw Master and guide the blade through rightful trials.”&quotI&#039ll become the Claw Master or whatever it takes. I will survive in this Arad!&quotWill DFO veteran Jinseong successfully complete his mission and return to the real world? The sto
